articles.description: Coronavirus: Russia now has world’s second highest number of COVID-19 cases
articles.content:
Russia has surged past a host of European countries to become the worlds second most afflicted by coronavirus. The vast country of 145 million people has now officially recorded 227,737 cases of COVID-19, more than the UK, Spain, Italy or France.
